TopicTitle: I have found a bug, where do I report it?

Articles.Content:
There seems to be a minor problem if you use the little rovemax wheels inside the tiny circular bay, if the wheels clip. The bug causes the game to crash, especially everytime you revert with a craft that has clipped wheels, like a rover you havn't deployed yet.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-01T03:20:46Z" title="07/01/2015 03:20  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 1, 2015</time> by leocrumb**
Go to the Kerbal Network. There's a thread title [bug Tracker] that signifies a report.
